Package tripleplay.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScreenStack.Predicate
    Used to operate on screens.
    ScreenStack.Transition
    Implements a particular screen transition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimScreen
    An abstract screen that will contain animations.
    Screen
    Contains the UI for a single game screen.
    ScreenSpace
    Maintains a 2D layout of Screens.
    ScreenSpace.Screen
    A screen that integrates with ScreenSpace.
    ScreenSpace.UIScreen
    A Screen that takes care of basic UI setup for you.
    ScreenStack
    Manages a stack of screens.
    UIAnimScreen
    An abstract screen that contains UI and animations.
    UIScreen
    An abstract screen that will contain a user interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScreenSpace.Dir
    The directions in which a new screen can be added.
    ScreenStack.Transition.Dir
    Direction constants, used by transitions.
